State.Author: Altairp
State.Description: An Add-On pack containing new agricultural plots (with animals in them) for the Sim Settlements mod.
State.Name: Altairp's Animal Farm - Add-On for Sim Settlements

State.Author: pra
State.Description: Adds a holotape for Sim Settlement troubleshooting
State.Name: ASAM Maintenance Software

State.Author: kinggath
State.Description: Monitors your save file for data loss and warns you when you load the game, so you can avoid wasting time playing on a busted save and roll back immediately.
State.Name: Canary Save File Monitor

Original.Name: Creations by COOTS Infinite Buster 2nd Try-29250-2-8-1539768042.rar

State.Author: Cpt_COOTS
State.Description: An Add-on pack that includes 2 new Residentials, up to 7 Commercials, 1 Industrial, 3 Martials, 2 Recreational, 1 Agricultural, get 2 versions of the leaders Dogmeat, Deezer, Goodfeels, and Shaw as City Leaders!, 4 New flags, 14 new options for your City Planner Desk, world spawn easter eggs, and a settings holotape!
State.Name: Creations by COOTS

State.Author: Pendan
State.Description: Randomizes the faces and clothing of the settlement visitor system in Sim Settlements
State.Name: Diverse Visitors for Sim Settlements

Original.Name: DownTime - A Sim Settlements Add On-42740-1-1-1593909851.7z

State.Author: Desamona
State.Description: Addon pack of 6 new recreational plots for the mod, Sim Settlements.
State.Name: DownTime - A Sim Settlement Addon

State.Author: Uituit
State.Description:
Aquatic Themed plots, boats and floating plots mostly for water but same land based plots to.



ESP and ESL versions
State.Name: Flotsam and Jetsam -Sim Settlements Addon pack

State.Author: kinggath - uituit - and friends
State.Description:
Frank and Ron clash in an epic battle of cybernetic warriors versus robotic supremacy! 



 2 new fully voiced settlers, 2 new City Plans, and 2 custom Faction Packs with unique rules.
State.Name: Franktown Versus Rontown - A Sim Settlements Story

State.Author: registrator2000
State.Description: HUDFramework is a UI framework that makes it possible for mods to add new UI elements to the HUD.
State.Name: HUDFramework

State.Author: mytigio
State.Description: An add-on for Sim Settlements that adds new Industrial Plots to the rotation.  These industrial plots focus on providing specific resources and providing special features such as robot building and item production instead of increasing the general "scavenger" pool. Also adds a Rust Devils faction for Sim Settlements Conqueror
State.Name: Industrial City Sim Settlements Add-On

Original.Name: Institute Settlements - A Sim Settlements Add on-35795-1-2-0-1545546979.7z

State.Author: Argyuile AKA MrTrust
State.Description: Tired of running the institute and having them hide below ground.   Screw that, make an outpost do some research, show those mutated wastlanders what civilization looks like.
State.Name: Institute Settlements - A Sim Settlements Add on Pack

State.Author: Innocent
State.Description: I refuse to believe out of every person that ran down into the vaults, all of them forgot their bag of WEED? I think not!!! Introducing the SS Add-On pack (Legalize the Commonwealth), expect future additions :D
State.Name: Legalize the Commonwealth (Sim Settlements Add-On)

State.Author: Whisper
State.Description:
Are you sick of scrapping your settlements to the ground so you can build on them? Me too.



One click of a button in a holotape - gone in sixty seconds! (Depending upon the power of your gaming rig.)
State.Name: Raze My Settlement

State.Author: cadpnq
State.Description: SMM provides an easy way to add custom menus and makes said menus automatically disappear on uninstall (without breaking your build menu!)
State.Name: Settlement Menu Manager

State.Author: kinggath
State.Description: Settlers should build their own damn houses (and farms, and shops, and...), you've got a Commonwealth to explore!
State.Name: Sim Settlements

Original.Name: Sim Settlements - City Plan Pack - Contest Entries v 1.0.13a-35648-1-0-13a-1576896203.7z

State.Author: Sim Settlements Community
State.Description:
An ever-growing pack of City Plans - with no other requirements than Sim Settlements!



Created by the community for the monthly City Plan Contest.
State.Name: Sim Settlements - City Plan Pack - Contest Entries

State.Author: IDontEvenKnow
State.Description: Designed to simplify general logistical concerns, this mod adds an Industrial plot that automates the creation of supply lines, improves inter-settlement resource sharing and more.
State.Name: Sim Settlements - IDEK's Logistics Station

Original.Name: Sim Settlements - Ruined Homes and Gardens 4.1.2-23917-4-1-2-1575234368.7z

State.Author: Ruinedworld
State.Description: Adds 30+ plots including raised bed gardens, three specialized scrap scavaging shacks... Advanced industrial tree with Watershed, Compost, Wild plant greenhouse, and the Wild crop adhesive lab! More to come!
State.Name: Sim Settlements - Ruined Homes and Gardens Add-on

Original.Name: VaultLand by Rodericksblade Addon for Sim Settlements-31365-1-4.7z

State.Author: Rodericksblade
State.Description: A series of fun, quirky, and Vault-techy interiors for your dwellers to enjoy!
State.Name: Sim Settlements Add-on pack -- VaultLand

State.Author: Uituit
State.Description:
They Are Here

    You Cannot Hide 

       You Cannot Run

      They Will Hunt You

        Then 

           They 

           Will

 Kill You



BLOOD MOON RAIDERS
State.Name: Sim Settlements Add-On Pack Blood Moon Raiders

Original.Name: Sim Settlements Add-On Pack Classic Shacks-25628-1-2.zip

State.Author: ProfVerstrooid
State.Description: This pack adds in new styles of wasteland living for Sim Settlements that are supposed to resemble the shacks from the older Bethesda Fallouts. These are all made using Fallout 4 assets.
State.Name: Sim Settlements Add-On Pack Classic Shacks

Original.Name: Another Brick In The Wall - AddOn Pack for Sim Settlements-27043-1-1.7z

State.Author: Sebbo86
State.Description: Addon for the SimSettlements Mod based around Brick/Stone Buildings
State.Name: Sim Settlements Addon - Another Brick in the Wall

State.Author: Paw Paw
State.Description:
Removed ref causing some  crashes and incompatibility with other mods loaded with this one. Sorry for any inconveniences it may have caused.

Tired of those lazy settlers that won't clean up after themselves? Not enough initiative to pick up the garbage in their homes and shops. Come On Man.
State.Name: Sim Settlements AddOn - Plots by Paw Paw

State.Author: RobotSmell
State.Description: Sim Settlement Add On that includes some buildings that are intended to be joined up and placed together to make a set.  Now needs all DLC's for Badge Factory and future additions.  Now also includes multi-occupancy plots.  Build a main plot, then add interior plots to enhance the plot.
State.Name: Sim Settlements Addon - RS Buildings

State.Author: Samutz and Wulfharth
State.Description: A Sim Settlements Addon Pack containing 22 vault-themed interior plot plans, 2 city planner desks, 4 flags, and several vault-specific features.
State.Name: Sim Settlements Addon Pack - Vault-Tec Tools

Original.Name: Sim Settlements Addon Pack - Walled Gardens and More-45176-1-0-1589973039.7z

State.Author: Whisper
State.Description: Adds 14 new external 2x2 agricultural plots to Sim Settlements. More are planned.
State.Name: Sim Settlements Addon Pack - Walled Gardens and More

Original.Name: Whisper's Power Plots - Sim Settlements Addon-36754-0-6-1596352507.7z

State.Author: Whisper
State.Description:
SIM SETTLEMENTS ADDON



Adds five new Industrial plots (player-select ONLY) that generate wireless power and radiate it across a small or large part of your settlement.
State.Name: Sim Settlements Addon Pack - Whisper's Power Plots

State.Author: Uituit
State.Description:
ITS BIG..........V 7 now needs Nuka World DLC

 ESP and ESL versions
State.Name: Sim Settlements Addon pack Junk Town-EXTREME

State.Author: Uituit
State.Description: With the Fallout of nuclear war devastating the commonwealth, one would think the inhabitants would learn to build out of the junk that remained. In this  add-on pack for SimSettlements, your settlers will do just that, build from the junk that they've found laying around.
State.Name: Sim Settlements AddOn Pack-Junk Town

Original.Name: Sim Settlements Addon Pack Junk Town-Fences-27555-8-1565665475.7z

State.Author: Uituit
State.Description: Fences for Sim Settlements.
State.Name: Sim Settlements AddOn Pack-Junk Town-Fences

State.Author: Kytampe
State.Description: This addon will blend new and old into nice homes, shops or whatever you need to have a vibrant community. Will constantly be updated with new plots.
State.Name: Sim Settlements AddonPack - Awsometown

State.Author: Sim Settlements Community
State.Description:
Season 2 of the City Plan Contest entries.



An ever-growing pack of City Plans - with no other requirements than Sim Settlements!
State.Name: Sim Settlements City Plan Pack - Season 2

Original.Name: Sim Settlements Mega Pack - Year One 1.0.5-30396-1-0-5-1542914873.7z

State.Author: kinggath and friends
State.Description:
Over 100 building plans from throughout the community for Sim Settlements!



Includes 11 brand new building plans that will unlock based on the DLC you have!
State.Name: Sim Settlements Mega Pack - Year One

State.Author: Sim Settlements Community
State.Description: Over 120 building plans from throughout the community for Sim Settlements - including a large number of raider themed designs!
State.Name: Sim Settlements Mega Pack - Year Three

State.Author: Sim Settlements Community
State.Description: Over 100 building plans from throughout the community for Sim Settlements!
State.Name: Sim Settlements Mega Pack - Year Two

State.Author: Ohnno
State.Description: Sim Settlements Addon by Ohnno.
State.Name: Sim Settlements Scrappers

State.Author: Eldarth
State.Description:
A SimSettlements Addon



Homesteaders - settlers willing to invest a little more time and energy in their homes. There has been a certain stability brought to the Commonwealth, and the homesteaders are looking to rebuild more than simple shacks and rickety wooden structures.
State.Name: SimHomestead - a Sim Settlements add on

Original.Name: Simple Living - Sim Settlements Add-on Pack-40320-1-1-1581628593.zip

State.Author: Iascus
State.Description:
New Version! Some furnitures in various rooms have been moved to fit better with left or right entry rooms in city plans. If you see floating suitcases or other glitches, please try Refresh Plot. If that doesn't help, please leave a comment.



Lightly themed, wastelandy Sim Settlements plots in between the more wild wastelandy add-on packs
State.Name: Simple Living - Sim Settlements Add-on Pack

Original.Name: Simple Living - Sim Settlements Add-on Pack-40320-1-0-1566678584.zip

State.Author: Iascus
State.Description:
New Version! Some furnitures in various rooms have been moved to fit better with left or right entry rooms in city plans. If you see floating suitcases or other glitches, please try Refresh Plot. If that doesn't help, please leave a comment.



Lightly themed, wastelandy Sim Settlements plots in between the more wild wastelandy add-on packs
State.Name: Simple Living - Sim Settlements Add-on Pack

Original.Name: Simple Living - Sim Settlements Add-on Pack-40320-1-2-1583259865.zip

State.Author: Iascus
State.Description:
New Version! Some furnitures in various rooms have been moved to fit better with left or right entry rooms in city plans. If you see floating suitcases or other glitches, please try Refresh Plot. If that doesn't help, please leave a comment.



Lightly themed, wastelandy Sim Settlements plots in between the more wild wastelandy add-on packs
State.Name: Simple Living - Sim Settlements Add-on Pack

State.Author: pra
State.Description: Random stuff which I felt like adding to SimSettlements.
State.Name: Sim Settlements - Pra's Random Addon

State.Author: SirLach
State.Description: A collection of small internal residential plots to add flavour and character to your settlements. Perfect for placing plots in tight spaces!
State.Name: SirLach's Intimate Spaces - Sim Settlement Add-on

State.Author: SirLach
State.Description: A collection of military themed Martial and Recreational plots  that will help you keep those pesky raiders/muties/institute/bad guys at bay.
State.Name: SirLach's Ultimate Defenses - Sim Settlement Add-on

State.Author: CDante
State.Description: The mod allows you to export your settlements into external blueprint files, share them with others or import them back to any of your savegames for any of your characters.
State.Name: Transfer Settlements - Shareable Settlement Blueprints

State.Author: Unofficial Patch Project Team
State.Description: A comprehensive bugfixing mod for Fallout 4. The goal of the Unofficial Fallout 4 Patch (aka UFO4P) is to eventually fix every bug with Fallout 4 not officially resolved by the developers to the limits of the Creation Kit and community-developed tools, in one easy-to-install package.
State.Name: Unofficial Fallout 4 Patch

State.Author: VFX
State.Description: Some more houses for Sim Settlements plus a couple Martial Plots. Larger buildings for more of a "downtown" feel. Uploaded a WIP with no requirements besides Sim Settlements, randomized color, navigation. I am working on a new addon coming soon.
State.Name: VFX Downtown Sim Settlements Addon

State.Author: Tinuvia and Myrmarachne
State.Description: Adds 63 plots to Sim Settlements (or 122 if you use the All-In-One). As in Tower town mayhem, Pizzas with rat topping, and a Messy gun shop! Wasteland Venturers, bigger and bolder than ever before!
State.Name: Wasteland Venturers 2 - Sim Settlements Addon Pack

State.Author: kinggath
State.Description:
Framework to open up the settlement system to editing by the community.



For Players: New controls and faster, more stable workshop scripts.



For Modders: Add new resource types, override settings, and generally change the way settlements work dynamically.
State.Name: Workshop Framework

State.Author: kinggath
State.Description:
Transforms Workshop mode into a God simulator - giving you all of the tools you need to create amazing settlements. 



Flight, Undo Buttons, Layers, Cloning Tools, Free Build Mode, and more!
State.Name: Workshop Plus

State.Author: kinggath
State.Description:
Transforms Workshop mode into a God simulator - giving you all of the tools you need to create amazing settlements. 



Flight, Undo Buttons, Layers, Cloning Tools, Free Build Mode, and more!
State.Name: Workshop Plus

State.Author: DoubleYou
State.Description: Bethesda's INI configuration files are a mess. BethINI optimizes the game for increased graphical fidelity and performance.
State.Name: BethINI

State.Author: Kassent
State.Description: This is a F4SE plugin which makes console menu show extra useful infomation about selected target,for example, target's name, ID, baseID, mod name and so on.This plugin also add some extra info lists to console to show selected actor's all kinds of info like factions, perks, active effects, actor values, equipments and so on.
State.Name: Better Console - F4SE

State.Author: reg2k - Neanka - shadowslasher410
State.Description: The Mod Configuration Menu is a settings page for mods! It provides a central location for mod configuration, accessible via the Pause menu.
State.Name: Mod Configuration Menu

State.Author: TheLich
State.Description: Place/build objects in settlements everywhere you want, change objects whatever you like. No more RED!
State.Name: Place Everywhere

State.Author: reg2k
State.Description: Faster Workshop is an F4SE plugin that optimizes workshop loading times by replacing some of the most expensive and inefficient regions of workshop loading code with far more efficient versions. Also provides a hotkey to instantly enter Workshop mode and fixes workshop icon load lag.
State.Name: Faster Workshop (Workshop Lag Fix)

State.Author: Kerber
State.Description: Speeds up game start by storing INI files in memory instead of opening, parsing and closing the file each time some value from it is needed.
State.Name: PrivateProfileRedirector F4 - Faster game start (INI file cacher)
